Text.val: 26.10.2012 SH SCR17619 Skip second GB723 argument
08.02.2010 AK SCR15170 added 6 new columns to the CSV file
28.08.2009 SH SCR14832 Added BDC151 PI.LEVEL and PO.NIHIL_CREDITLIMIT
08.08.2009 GB SCR14787 Changed DEBC_CREDITLIMIT into BDC151.PO.CREDITLIMIT
03.02.2009 SH SCR14357 Fixed problem with uniti of v.PI.DATE if empty
Only if running on the I5

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Overview Debtors Due 90')&IF (NOT ({0,8}),' '&MlsTrans ('No debtors exists for the query'),'')

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select distinct DEBC_NO, DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBC, DEBC_DEBH, DEBC_CREDITLIMIT, DEBB_ACTINVAH, DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION
from :1/INVO join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = INVO_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = INVO_CLNTNO and CLNT212_INTERCREDIT = 'N' and CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL = 'N' join :1/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and DEBB_ACTINVAH > 0 join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null
where INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and days(INVO_DUEDATE) < (days(':2') - 90)
order by DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBC for fetch only

ExpSyntax.val: Trim ({0,1})&';'&'Dispute amount'&';'&'Employee Incasso '&';'&'Last action'&';'&'Date last action'&';'&'Date last payment'&';'&'Direct payments'
